import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import '../administration.css'; import add from '../../assets/images/plus.png'; import { populateTables } from '../administration'; import validateSession from "../../session/session"; import axios from "axios"; import deleteIcon from '../../assets/images/delete.png'; import confirmIcon from '../../assets/images/tick.png'; import discardIcon from '../../assets/images/close.png'; import edit from '../../assets/images/edit.png'; function SuperAdmin() { useEffect(() => { validateSession('SuperAdmin'); document.getElementsByClassName('nav-item active')[0].classList.remove('active'); document.getElementById('authenticationTab').classList.add('active'); }, []); return (
{/* Header section title */}
School Admin
{/* School admin section tables structure */}
{/* Horizontal row section containing multiple tables */}
{/* Manage Student table */}
Manage Students
{customers.map(customer => { if ((customer.editcustomer || customer.addcustomer)) return (); else return ( ) })}
First Name Last Name Email Phone User_Type addCustomerColumn()} src={add} height="13px" width="13px" alt='add records' />
handleCluChange(event, customer)} /> handleCluChange(event, customer)} /> handleCluChange(event, customer)} /> handleCluChange(event, customer)} /> addOrEditCustomer(customer)} title="Confirm" /> customer.editcustomer = false} title="Cancel" />
{customer.First_Name} {customer.Last_Name} {customer.Email} {customer.Phone} {customer.User_Type} editCustomerColumn(customer)} title="edit" /> deleteCustomer(customer.ID)} title="delete" />
{/* Manage Business Owners table */}
Manage Business Owners
{businesss.map(business => { if ((business.editbusiness || business.addbusiness)) return (); else return ( ) })}
First Name Last Name Email Phone User_Type addBusinessColumn()} src={add} height="13px" width="13px" alt='add records' />
handleBusChange(event, business)} required /> handleBusChange(event, business)} required /> handleBusChange(event, business)} required /> handleBusChange(event, business)} required /> addOrEditBusiness(business)} title="Confirm" /> business.editbusiness = false} title="Cancel" />
{business.First_Name} {business.Last_Name} {business.Email} {business.Phone} {business.User_Type} editBusinessColumn(business)} title="edit" /> deleteBusiness(business.ID)} title="delete" />
{/* Horizontal row section containing multiple tables */}
{/* Manage Posts table */}
Manage Posts
{posts.map(post => { if ((post.editposts || post.addposts)) return (); else return ( ) })}
Post_ID Creator_ID Post_Description Created_Date addPostColumn()} src={add} height="13px" width="13px" alt='add records' />
handlePosChange(event, post)} /> handlePosChange(event, post)} /> handlePosChange(event, post)} /> handlePosChange(event, post)} /> addOrEditposts(post)} title="Confirm" /> post.editposts = false} title="Cancel" />
{post.post_ID} {post.creator_ID} {post.post_desc} {post.created_date} editPostsColumn(post)} title="edit" /> deletePosts(post.post_ID)} title="delete" />
{/* Manage clubs table */}
Manage Clubs
{clubs.map(club => { if ((club.editclubs || club.addclubs)) return (); else return ( ) })}
Club_ID Club_Name Club_Email School_ID Club_Description addClubColumn()} src={add} height="13px" width="13px" alt='add records' />
handleCluChange(event, club)} /> handleCluChange(event, club)} /> handleCluChange(event, club)} /> handleCluChange(event, club)} /> handleCluChange(event, club)} /> addOrEditclubs(club)} title="Confirm" /> club.editclubs = false} title="Cancel" />
{club.club_ID} {club.club_name} {club.club_email} {club.school_Id} {club.club_description} editClubsColumn(club)} title="edit" /> deleteClubs(club.club_ID)} title="delete" />
{/* Horizontal row section containing multiple tables */}

Manage Customers

ID First Nmae Last Name Email Created Date User Type Address { }} src={add} height="13px" width="13px" alt='add records' />

*/}

ID First Nmae Last Name Email Created Date User Type Address { }} src={add} height="13px" width="13px" alt='add records' />

); } export default SuperAdmin;
